title: Dear Black Athlete
description: Dear Black Athlete is a series of conversations tackling the challenges of being a professional athlete while being Black in America's social climate. Led by Cari Champion, the special features letters and discussion from notable civic leaders and sports figures.
itunes:title: Dear Black Athlete
itunes:author: ESPN, ESPNW, Cari Champion
itunes:subtitle: Dear Black Athlete is a series of conversations tackling the challenges of being a professional athlete while being Black in America's social climate. Led by Cari Champion, the special features letters and discussion from notable civic leaders and sports
